thread.title: Amar
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Amar

author: Amar
title: Amar
text: Order took slightly longer than expected but apart from that great service. The Arizer extreme Q is amazing so far I love it and for the price it's a steal. I would recommend this product to anyone, and even more recommend this site for having outstanding prices and well packaged shipping.
